name: asegstatsdiff
description: Compute and report percentage differences in aseg morphometry data between two subjects.

inputs.description: The first subject to be compared.
inputs.name: Subject 1

inputs.description: The second subject to be compared.
inputs.name: Subject 2

inputs.description: Optionally specify a directory to write the output asegstats.txt.
inputs.name: Output Directory

output-files.description: Output table with percent differences added.
output-files.name: Asegstats Output

author: FreeSurfer Developers
